title: NoSuchMethodError: void org.hibernate.boot.internal.MetadataImpl.<init> when Upgrading Hibernate to 6.6.0.CR1
body:
### Describe the bug


```bash 
Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: 'void org.hibernate.boot.internal.MetadataImpl.<init>(java.util.UUID, org.hibernate.boot.spi.MetadataBuildingOptions, java.util.Map, java.util.List, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, java.util.Map, org.hibernate.boot.model.relational.Database, org.hibernate.boot.spi.BootstrapContext)'
	at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.runtime.boot.FastBootMetadataBuilder.trimBootstrapMetadata(FastBootMetadataBuilder.java:469)
	at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.runtime.boot.FastBootMetadataBuilder.build(FastBootMetadataBuilder.java:432)
	at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.runtime.PersistenceUnitsHolder.createMetadata(PersistenceUnitsHolder.java:101)
	at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.runtime.PersistenceUnitsHolder.constructMetadataAdvance(PersistenceUnitsHolder.java:73)
	at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.runtime.PersistenceUnitsHolder.initializeJpa(PersistenceUnitsHolder.java:40)
	at io.quarkus.hibernate.orm.runtime.HibernateOrmRecorder$1.created(HibernateOrmRecorder.java:78)
	at io.quarkus.arc.runtime.ArcRecorder.initBeanContainer(ArcRecorder.java:80)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.steps.ArcProcessor$notifyBeanContainerListeners1304312071.deploy_0(Unknown Source)
	at io.quarkus.deployment.steps.ArcProcessor$notifyBeanContainerListeners1304312071.deploy(Unknown Source)
	... 9 more

```

### Expected behavior

Should work as 6.6.0.Alpha1

### Actual behavior

Check the build stack:https://github.com/hantsy/quarkus-sandbox/actions/runs/9654716441/job/26629425710?pr=2308

### How to Reproduce?

Check the jakarta data example in https://github.com/hantsy/quarkus-sandbox

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 10

### Output of `java -version`

21

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.12.0.CR1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

3.9.7

### Additional information

_No response_
